name: Cubic Slider
description:
This game is based off of a Brackeys Tutorial
I added a bunch of new features to it and post-processing.

I followed the tutorial 2 years ago, found the project and decided to add more stuff to it!
This is the first game I've ever made (that I actually finished).

If you have any suggestions or want me to make more levels please tell me, I will gladly add it to the game. 

How To Play

AD / QD to move left and right
